content:
@WG-prioritization/alerts issue #90316 has been requested for prioritization.

Procedure

  • Priority?
  • Regression?
  • Notify people/groups?
  • Needs I-nominated?

uhm ... I would tend set P-high as it could be breaking the developer's experience on Tier 1 platform (aarch64-unknown-linux-gnu).
Can't decide if shoudl be p-critical (and release blocker)

Uhm, I don't think it's P-critical as Felix said on the issue:

My current hypothesis is that this is a bug entirely on the valgrind side.

(i.e. we don't have an actionable item there currently), and the bug happens only on valgrind, so the affected users should be smaller than a general P-critical issue. P-high seems fine to me as it indeed breaks developer experience (actually, Felix has encountered it).
